#cloud-config
#mongodb
manage_etc_hosts: true
fqdn: mongo.scivera.com
hostname: mongo
apt_update: true
apt_upgrade: true

packages:
 - fontconfig
 - clamav
 - multitail
 - git-core
 - awscli
 - tmpreaper
 - fail2ban
 - chrony

groups:
  - ubuntu: [deploy]
  - deploy

users:
  - default
  - name: deploy
    gecos: deploy
    primary-group: deploy
    groups: admin
    shell: /bin/bash
    sudo: ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - ssh-rsa  dbg-pub
      - ssh-rsa  jamieorc@jamieorc-mbp.local
      - ssh-rsa  deploy@scivera-main
      - ssh-rsa  vigneshkuppusamy@Vigneshs-MacBook-Pro.local
      - ssh-rsa  markberrang@Marks-MacBook-Pro.local
      - ssh-rsa  mtaisigue@gmail.com
      - ssh-rsa  inge.zelaya@gmail.com

mounts:
  - [ xvdf, /var/lib/mongodb, "auto", "defaults,nofail", "0", "2" ]

system_info:
   default_user:
    name: Ubuntu
    plain_text_passwd: 'ubuntu'
    home: /home/ubuntu
    shell: /bin/bash
    lock_passwd: True
    gecos: Ubuntu
    groups: [adm, audio, cdrom, dialout, floppy, video, plugdev, dip, netdev]

runcmd:
 - mkdir -p /var/lib/mongodb
 - dd if=/dev/zero of=/swap bs=1M count=11264
 - mkswap /swap
 - swapon /swap
 - echo "/swap swap swap defaults 0 0" >> /etc/fstab
 - mkfs -t ext4 /dev/xvdf
 - mount -a
 
final_message: "Whew! That was a lot of work and now the system is finally up, after $UPTIME seconds"
